title: You missed a Zaun champion

replies.body: Didn't he get the story where Warwick was created? It was told from his point of view. Though yes, i did forget him.

A story and lore and lore are 2 different things. Stories are events in the life of a champ but only lore can tell you who a champ is a s a person. Even still, the story released is more of a promotional piece opposed to an actually singed story.
Riot stated that in the future both Singed and Twitch would receive their deserved lores.
Isn't Singed more associated with Noxus and the invasion of Ionia?

That's like saying Taliyah is more associated with Ionia because she trained with yasuo there. No offense, just making an example. Basically champions can have various ties but will almost always fall back into their homeland for major stories.
they couldn't get his lore fleshed out in time, that's why
